  zh-CN: 多样的 Child
  en-US: Diverse Child

---

## zh-CN

Debug usage

## en-US

Debug usage

```jsx
import { Space, Button, Popconfirm } from 'antd';

ReactDOM.render(
  <Space>
    Button
    <Button>Button</Button>
    Button
    <Popconfirm title="Are you sure delete this task?" okText="Yes" cancelText="No">
      <Button>Delete</Button>
    </Popconfirm>
    <Popconfirm title="Are you sure delete this task?" okText="Yes" cancelText="No">
      <Button disabled>Delete</Button>
    </Popconfirm>
    {null}
    {false}
    {1}
    Button
  </Space>,
  mountNode,
);
```
